 Current process doc at link above.
 
 = Process =
* Spin up server from AMI
* Activate Windows and MS Office
* Update Timezone on server
* Join Existing Customer Domain
* Adjust DNS
* Name new app server (ex. HTHAPP2)
* Install SQL Server and SQL Managment Studio
* Install IIS
* Install Silverlight
* Install Sophos

* Migrate/Backup Data from existing App server to new App server
* To Move:
  a) C:\Medstreaming
  b) D:\Medstreaming
  c) SQL mdf files
* Run dcpromo.exe
  a) Installs AD and DNS binaries and syncs AD data
* Change the Operations Master for:
  a) AD Users and Groups
  b) AD Domains and Trusts
  c) AD Schema
* Query FSMO to verify new server is Master
* Setup SQL
  a) Attach mdf files
* Change server identity in DB
* Install Medstreaming Software
  a) Install newest release
  b) Run first use config
* Install newest Launcher
* Install Analytics
* Install Portal
* Install EMR
* Register KDImageeditor.ocx
* Configure IIS
* Test

== On Cutover Night ==
* Snapshot AMI old app server
* Backup SQL from existing App server
* Migrate to new app server
  a) Attach new/current mdf files
* Shutdown old server and terminate
  a) Need public and private IP from old app server
* Rename new server to old server
* On the existing terminal server
  a) Change DNS to point to new App server
  b) Run first use config and point to new Server and DB
  c) Run Medstreaming Client and test
